name: Echo
description: The Echo is a medium-sized chaotic evil fiend characterized by its unsettling presence, high Strength and Dexterity, sharp iron claws, and formidable combat abilities.
memorable: It combines psychological disruption with potent combat skills, making it a unique threat.
goals: To disrupt opponents in combat while dealing consistent damage.
relations: May be encountered alongside other chaotic fiends or serve dark powers.
environment: Can typically be found in dark, chaotic places, often linked to the Abyss.
strengths: High Strength and Dexterity make it exceptionally effective in combat situations.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to specific damage types not detailed in its resistances.
attacks: Utilizes iron claws for melee attacks that deal slashing damage and can deafen opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Cacophony disrupts enemy concentration, providing tactical advantages.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 14, indicating keen insight.
skills: Skilled in persuasion and stealth, demonstrating its deceptive capabilities.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions.
Resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage.
Capable of teleportation for enhanced combat mobility.
Has a special ability that stuns opponents and impairs their cognitive abilities.
Employs tactics that may confuse and disorient enemies.
test_queries: chaotic evil fiend with stunning wails
